itunes:subtitle: Actor and director Clayne Crawford joins the show to talk about having a guest spot on Buffy the Vampire Slayer in the '90s, what it's like working with James Franco when he's method acting, that time he and Ross got blackout drunk with Sting, the time K...
itunes:summary:
Actor and director Clayne Crawford joins the show to talk about having a guest spot on Buffy the Vampire Slayer in the '90s, what it's like working with James Franco when he's method acting, that time he and Ross got blackout drunk with Sting, the time Kiefer Sutherland whipped out his dong in the middle of a bar to make Clayne feel uncomfortable, and his fight scene with Chad Michael Murray on One Tree Hill.
